item.title: Low Ceremony Sagas with Wolverine
item.description: Wolverine puts a very high emphasis on reducing code ceremony and tries really hard to keep itself out of your application code. Wolverine is also built with testability in mind. If you’d be interested in learning more about how Wolverine could simplify your existing application code or set you up with a solid foundation for sustainable … Continue reading Low Ceremony Sagas with Wolverine → Link to article: https://jeremydmiller.com/2024/08/20/low-ceremony-sagas-with-wolverine/
